Subject:Re: Time Sensitive Items: Thursday Afternoon
Message 1229 of 4024
The RO as currently filed is very clear about communications permitted.
After further discussion and review with my lawyer, I will only propose language change:
OFW to add management of shared assets
E-mails with 3rd parties, for co parenting and management of shared assets.
The credible physical threat stands and applies for me.
Deviation from these guidelines have serious consequences.
Sent:02/08/2024 at 04:43 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/08/2024 at 04:54 PM)
Subject:RO Communications/Kids
Message 1230 of 4024
Wow... no running list, no emails between us, you are saying I will beat you, despite never beating you.
Did I do something wrong? You told me your expectations so we could return to normalcy. I thought I had been doing that and then some but now
you’re bringing the hammer down even harder and making it clear you’ll send me to jail...
